body.p: State of Ky & Co of Wayne

The afieant G. C. Perdew States that he was 1st Sergt in the 7th Regt Tenn Vol If he States that he was at Huntsville Tenn on or about the 10" of Aug 1862 and States that James M. Smith was a private of his Co and Regt and was at Hunsvill Tenn on the 10 of Aug 1862 to the best of his knoledge he futher states that he was at the Russel Co Circuit Co and he Stats to the best of his Knowledge that Said Smith could not have bin in Russel County at the time he was at cused of Robbing Wm Lucas he States that Smith was with him on 15th of Aug 1862 at Battle at Huntsvill Tenn

I am willing to Sine the peticient for Smith G. C. Perdew
formley Lt Co. E" 9 Regt Ten Cavy

Clinton C't C't
vs
J. M. Smith
